checks.name: OBM IMAP Archive Connection Check
checks.description: Checks that the OBM IMAP Archive server(s) are up and running.

checks.name: OBM IMAP Archive Cyrus Connection Check
checks.description: Checks that the OBM IMAP Archive server(s) can connect to Cyrus.

checks.name: OBM IMAP Archive Cyrus Archive Partition Check
checks.description: Checks that the OBM IMAP Archive server(s) can access the Cyrus archive partition.
